meta_title: Mastering the EOQ Equation for MRO: 2026 Optimization Guide
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces to poor spare parts management. Use the EOQ equation to balance holding costs and reliability in your industrial facility.
title: How the EOQ Equation Solves the "Too Much vs. Too Little" Spare Parts Dilemma

hero_image.alt: Hero image for How the EOQ Equation Solves the "Too Much vs. Too Little" Spare Parts Dilemma

image_prompt: A professional hero image of a modern industrial warehouse setting. In the foreground, a diverse team of maintenance professionals (a man and a woman) wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests are reviewing inventory on a tablet (only the back of the tablet is visible). They are standing near organized industrial shelving units filled with spare parts like motors and gearboxes. The background shows a clean, well-lit manufacturing floor with a conveyor system. The lighting is bright and professional, conveying a sense of efficiency and high-tech logistics. Photo-realistic, 8k resolution, no text or words.
